boids.utils

Class GraphicalBoid

  • java.lang.Object
    • boids.utils.GraphicalBoid
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    gui.GraphicalElement

    public class GraphicalBoid
extends java.lang.Object
implements gui.GraphicalElement
    The GraphicalBoid is the graphical element registerd to the gui. The boid is drawn as a triangle that rotates towards its velocity.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GraphicalBoid(Vector2D location, Vector2D velocity, java.awt.Color drawColor, java.awt.Color fillColor, int boidSize)
      Initiates the GraphicalBoid with a location (that will be used to compute the polygon that will be drawn on the gui), a fill and draw color, and a size.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void paint(java.awt.Graphics2D g2d)
      Draws the boid.
      void rotateTo(Vector2D newVelocity)
      Rotates the graphical to a given velocity.
      void translate(int dx, int dy)
      Translates the graphical boid with given dx and dy.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • GraphicalBoid

        public GraphicalBoid(Vector2D location,
                     Vector2D velocity,
                     java.awt.Color drawColor,
                     java.awt.Color fillColor,
                     int boidSize)
        Initiates the GraphicalBoid with a location (that will be used to compute the polygon that will be drawn on the gui), a fill and draw color, and a size.
        Parameters:
        location - The location on the polygon in the 2D plane.
        velocity - The velocity to represent the orientation.
        drawColor - The color to draw the shape of the polygon.
        fillColor - The color to fill in the shape with.
        boidSize - The size of the polygon.

    • Method Detail

      • rotateTo

        public void rotateTo(Vector2D newVelocity)
        Rotates the graphical to a given velocity.
        Parameters:
        newVelocity - The new velocity for the polygon.

      • translate

        public void translate(int dx,
                      int dy)
        Translates the graphical boid with given dx and dy.
        Parameters:
        dx - The translation along the x-axis.
        dy - The translation along the y-axis.

      • paint

        public void paint(java.awt.Graphics2D g2d)
        Draws the boid.
        Specified by:
        paint in interface gui.GraphicalElement
        Parameters:
        g2d - A graphical instance to paint the polygon.
